listing_active_by_weight.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'resource' || ! doc.enabled || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([parseInt(doc.weight_cost, 10), doc._id], doc.name); }

listing_by_id.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'resource' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, doc.name); }

listing_uac_gateways.map: function (doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'resource' || doc.pvt_deleted || !doc.enabled) return; for (var index in doc.gateways) { if (!doc.gateways[index] || !doc.gateways[index].register) { continue; } var gateway = doc.gateways[index]; emit(doc._id, {'username': gateway.username, 'server': gateway.server, 'password': gateway.password, 'realm': gateway.realm, 'expiration': gateway.expiration, 'proxy': gateway.proxy, 'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id, 'id': doc._id + '-' + index, 'version': doc._rev})}}
